revealjs.footer: DOCUMENTING COPTIC MONASTIC HERITAGE 11-13 November 2024, Bibliotheca Alexandrina, Alexandria, Egypt

markdown.markdown:
```{r, echo=FALSE, warning = F} library(rmarkdown) library(knitr) library(kableExtra) library(ggplot2) library(dplyr) ``` ## Endangered Archaeology in Middle East and North Africa (EAMENA)
Smoke billows from the site of an Israeli airstrike on the Lebanese city of Baalbeck in the Bekaa Valley [Issued on: 23/09/2024 - 09:04 Modified: 24/09/2024 - 04:58] Â© Nidal SOLH / AFP
## EAMENA project (1/2) ::: {.panel-tabset} ### Teams ```{mermaid} flowchart TD subgraph EA[EAMENA] id1[University of Oxford] id2[University of Leicester] id3[University of Durham] end id1 ---> id6[The Database] id2 ---> id6 id3 ---> id6 subgraph MA[MAREA] id4[University of Southampton] id5[Ulster University] end id4 ---> id6 id5 ---> id6 style EA color:#f6d6d6 style MA color:#f6d6d6 style id1 fill:#f6d6d6,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style id2 fill:#f6d6d6,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style id3 fill:#f6d6d6,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style id4 fill:#f6d6d6,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px style id5 fill:#f6d6d6,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px click id1 "https://www.ox.ac.uk/" _blank click id2 "https://le.ac.uk/" _blank click id3 "https://www.durham.ac.uk/" _blank click id4 "https://www.southampton.ac.uk/" _blank click id5 "https://www.ulster.ac.uk/" _blank ``` ### Birth date :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="30%"} January 2015
project drafted in January 2014 ::: ::: {.column width="70%"}
'Terror in the Mosul Museum', published in 'The New Yorker', February 27, 2015
::: ::: ### Aims :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="30%"} - Rapidly assess the status of the archaeological landscape (built heritage) - Provide access to a set of data on endangered heritage (Open Access) ::: ::: {.column width="70%"}
Temple of Bel, Palmyra, Syria, year 2014 (above) and 2016 (below) © Google Earth
::: ::: ### Funders Arcadia Fund, a charitable fund of Lisbet Rausing & Peter Baldwin British Council Cultural Protection Fund ::: ## EAMENA project (2/2) ::: {.panel-tabset} ### Geographical coverage :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="30%"} Middle East North Africa (MENA) region ::: ::: {.column width="70%"}
EAMENA Grid Squares projected on Google Earth
::: ::: ### Temporal coverage :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="30%"} Paleolithic to World War II ::: ::: {.column width="70%"}
EAMENA periods (after 0 AD) © PeriodO
::: ::: ### Database
EAMENA Heritage Places counts in 2024
::: ## EAMENA database ::: {.panel-tabset} ### Open Access :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="30%"}
Batist, Z.; Roe, J., 2024. Open archaeology, open source? Internet Archaeology 67. 10.11141/ia.67.13
::: ::: {.column width="70%"} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### ACHP projects ```{=html}
``` ### Semantic Web ```{=html}
``` ::: ## Disturbances and Threats (1/2) ::: {.panel-tabset} ### War :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="60%"}
Destruction of the Temple of Bel by ISIS on August 23, 2015 (Palmyra, Syria)
::: ::: {.column width="40%"} ```{r} #| out-width: 400 #| out-height: 400 leaflet::leaflet() %>% leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$"Esri.WorldImagery", group = "Ortho") %>% leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$"OpenStreetMap", group = "OSM") %>% leaflet::addMarkers(lng = 38.2740283802469, lat = 34.54760862601158, popup="Temple of Bel") %>% leaflet::addLayersControl( baseGroups = c("Ortho", "OSM"), position = "topright") ``` ::: :::: ### Agriculture :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="60%"}
Development of ploughed fields and orchards around and within an archaeological site (Udhma, Jordan)
::: ::: {.column width="40%"} ```{r} #| out-width: 400 #| out-height: 400 leaflet::leaflet() %>% leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$"Esri.WorldImagery", group = "Ortho") %>% leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$"OpenStreetMap", group = "OSM") %>% leaflet::addMarkers(lng = 35.87992, lat = 32.12974, popup="Udhma") %>% leaflet::addLayersControl( baseGroups = c("Ortho", "OSM"), position = "topright") ``` ::: :::: ### Construction :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="60%"}
Road over a section of an exposed church excavation (Ma'in, Jordan) ©APAAME .
::: ::: {.column width="40%"} ```{r} #| out-width: 400 #| out-height: 400 leaflet::leaflet() %>% leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$"Esri.WorldImagery", group = "Ortho") %>% leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$"OpenStreetMap", group = "OSM") %>% leaflet::addMarkers(lng = 35.73318, lat = 31.67979, popup="Church in Ma'in") %>% leaflet::addLayersControl( baseGroups = c("Ortho", "OSM"), position = "topright") ``` ::: :::: ### Natural :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="60%"}
The rising sea waters slowly washed away the Temple of Isis (Sabratha, Libya)
::: ::: {.column width="40%"} ```{r} #| out-width: 400 #| out-height: 400 leaflet::leaflet() %>% leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$"Esri.WorldImagery", group = "Ortho") %>% leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$"OpenStreetMap", group = "OSM") %>% leaflet::addMarkers(lng = 12.487980812351678, lat = 32.80763810717728, popup="Isis Temple in Sabratha") %>% leaflet::addLayersControl( baseGroups = c("Ortho", "OSM"), position = "topright") ``` ::: :::: ### Looting :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="60%"}
Deir Abu Lifa 1 (DAL01), Looting and Illegal Activities ©Jan CigleneÄki, Coptic Monastic Heritage Archive
::: ::: {.column width="40%"} ```{r} #| out-width: 400 #| out-height: 400 leaflet::leaflet() %>% leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$"Esri.WorldImagery", group = "Ortho") %>% leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$"OpenStreetMap", group = "OSM") %>% leaflet::addMarkers(lng = 30.697174378033573, lat = 29.6170553267193, popup="Deir Abu Lifa 1") %>% leaflet::addLayersControl( baseGroups = c("Ortho", "OSM"), position = "topright") ``` ::: :::: ::: ::: {.notes} Destruction: iconoclasm, looting, etc. ::: ## Disturbances and Threats (2/2) ```{=html} ```
see the table on the EAMENA website
# Arches-based projects {background-image="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eamena-project/eamena-arches-dev/master/www/23889489303_b3df7d8cef_o.jpg"} ## Listed projects ```{=html} ``` ## Global South ```{=html} ``` ## Historic England
General view of Stonehenge (Wiltshire, England) Â© Historic England J940231
# Research {background-image="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eamena-project/eamena-arches-dev/master/www/23889489303_b3df7d8cef_o.jpg"} ## New Findings :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="60%"}
Fradley, M., Simi, F., & Guagnin, M. (2022) [ð link](https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/full/10.1177/09596836221114290)
::: ::: {.column width="40%"}
Globalkites ANR funded project interactive map screenshot [ð link](https://www.globalkites.fr/)
::: :::: ## New Findings {data-visibility=hidden} :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="60%"} ```{=html} ``` ```{=html} ``` ```{=html} ``` ```{=html} ```
New desert kites in Eastern Arabia
::: ::: {.column width="40%"}
Screenshot of the [Globalkites](https://www.globalkites.fr/) ANR funded project interactive map
::: :::: ## Analysing :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="40%"}
```{.r} eamenar::geojson_map_path() ```
::: ::: {.column width="60%"}
```{.r} eamenar::geojson_map_path(export.type = "profile") ```
::: :::: # Database Issues & Developments {background-image="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eamena-project/eamena-arches-dev/master/www/23889489303_b3df7d8cef_o.jpg"} ## Issues ::: {.panel-tabset} ### Coordinates & Looting :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="60%"}
Looting of the Assyrian site of Yasin Tepe (Sulaymaniyah, Iraq)
::: ::: {.column width="40%"} ```{r} #| out-width: 400 #| out-height: 400 leaflet::leaflet() %>% leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$"Esri.WorldImagery", group = "Ortho") %>% leaflet::addProviderTiles(leaflet::providers$"OpenStreetMap", group = "OSM") %>% leaflet::addMarkers(lng = 45.6491261, lat = 35.36001515088195, popup="Temple of Bel") %>% leaflet::addLayersControl( baseGroups = c("Ortho", "OSM"), position = "topright") ``` ::: :::: ### Institutional Actors :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="40%"}
"Protection of Syriaâs Cultural Heritage in Times of Armed Conflict" e-learning course for Syrian cultural heritage professionals (ICOMOS - ICCROM)
::: ::: {.column width="60%"} ```{=html} ``` ::: :::: \ \ ### Data & API Sovereignty
Middle East Geodatabase for Antiquities Jordan (MEGA Jordan), created in 2011
Jordan Masdar (Arches v5), created in 2021
XXX (Arches v7), to be created in 2023
### Data & API Sustainibility
&
Collaborate =
Sharing
and
Versioning
| project name | project url | GitHub repository | GitHub member names | |--------------|-----------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|-------------------------| | CAAL | | | @mnebbia, @BAPAlveyCHIC | | EAMENA | | | @zoometh | | MaESAM | | | @razekmh, @manojlokare | | MAHSA | | | @junaidjabbar01 | | MAPHSA | | | @jgregoriods | | MAPSS | | | @michaeltfisher | | MaREA | | | @ads04r |
::: ## Developments ::: {.panel-tabset} ### Software ::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="30%"}
EAMENA v4 ( v7)
* Internationalization (ÙØ±Ø­Ø¨ÙØ§, *bonjour*, ÛÛÙÙ, ...), multi-language data import/export * 3, 14, 8, ...
::: ::: {.column width="70%"}
Internationalization of the EAMENA database - Arabic
::: :::: ### Project ::: # Conclusion {background-image="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eamena-project/eamena-arches-dev/master/www/23889489303_b3df7d8cef_o.jpg"} ## Aknowledgments & Contact \ Arcadia Fund a charitable fund of Lisbet Rausing & Peter Baldwin British Council Cultural Protection Fund
